name: Crop Recommendation and Prediction System
desc: The Crop Recommendation and Prediction System project utilizes data-driven algorithms to provide personalized and accurate agricultural recommendations, optimizing crop selection and predicting yields based on environmental factors and historical data.

name: Yoga Pose Detection System
desc: The Yoga Pose Detection System project utilizes computer vision and machine learning techniques to accurately identify and analyze yoga poses from images or video, providing real-time feedback and guidance for practitioners.

name: Road Accident Analysis using Tableau
desc: A comprehensive data visualization project that employs Tableau's powerful tools to analyze and present insights into road accidents, aiding in the identification of patterns, contributing factors, and potential mitigation strategies.

name: HR Dashboard using Tableau
desc: Efficiently monitor and manage workforce dynamics with our Tableau-powered HR Dashboard, providing real-time insights into key human resources metrics for informed decision-making.

name: Kill the Virus
desc: An engaging JavaScript game where players navigate through challenging levels, aiming to eliminate viruses and test their reflexes in a fast-paced digital battle for health.
